definitions.definition: A person’s condition, position or standing relative to that of others.
definitions.example: Superstition is highly correlated with economic status.

definitions.definition: A situation or state of affairs.
definitions.example: New York is known for its status as a financial center.

definitions.definition: The legal condition of a person or thing.
(social networking) A function of some instant messaging applications, whereby a user may post a message that appears automatically to other users, if they attempt to make contact.
definitions.example: I'm just about to update my status to "busy".

definitions.definition: Short for status epilepticus or status asthmaticus.
